titleStmt.title: A true copy of a letter, Writen by Mr. Harrison, in Newgate, to a near relation, after his condemnation for the murther of Doctor Clinch.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Henry, d. 1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Randal Tayler near Stationers Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
